comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=inurl%3Ab.hatena.ne.jp%2Fentry](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dinurl%253Ab.hatena.ne.jp%252Fentry) ### Comment > #147257 > I can reproduce this issue as well. I suspect it is caused by the following rule. > ~hatena.ne.jp##a[href*="//b.hatena.ne.jp/entry/"] > Actually b.hatena.ne.jp/entry/ is a URL used for some web content in Japan, so I don't think it is appropriate to remove it from search results. > I suggest modifying this rule as follows. > ~hatena.ne.jp,~google.com,~google.co.jp,~search.yahoo.co.jp,~bing.com,~duckduckgo.com##a[href*="//b.hatena.ne.jp/entry/"] ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/cVYUQ03.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jDvWxS7.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.55 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media
